summary: A portrait of five men competing in the Miss Gay America pageant.
cast: Carl Glorioso|Victor Bowling|Robert Martin|David Lowman|Tony Brewer|Raquel Chevallier|Steve Devore|Nicole Dubois|Alyssa Edwards|Larry Edwards|Truly Fabu|Jake Fisher|Vicki Holleman|Layla LaRue|Luscious|Spencer May|Kirk Nelson|Roger Piatt|Leigh Shannon|Robert G. Speas|Wayne Wolters|Randy Fenoli
director: Directors: Ron Davis, Stewart Halpern-Fingerhut (as Stewart Halpern)
title: Pageant
